episode.title: Some Kind of Sandwich
episode.rawTitle: 283: ‘Some Kind of Sandwich’ With Dieter Bohn
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Dieter Bohn joins the show to talk about the iPad Magic Keyboard, the new iPhone SE, and the state of Android flagship phones.
episode.showNotes:
Dieter Bohn joins the show to talk about the iPad Magic Keyboard, the new iPhone SE, and the state of Android flagship phones.
